sentences.english: And now he's on the fast track to win a Nobel prize.
sentences.chinese: 现在他要得诺贝尔奖简直探囊取物。

sentences.english: The Nobel has never been given out for applied sciences before.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔奖以前从未颁给过应用科学领域。

sentences.english: The research that leads to a Nobel Prize in physics can sometimes be a little obscure.
sentences.chinese: 获得诺贝尔奖的研究有时候是有些模糊晦涩的。

sentences.english: It was a feather in his cap to win the Nobel Prize.
sentences.chinese: 获得诺贝尔奖对他是至高的荣誉。

sentences.english: Over the intervening 109 years, more than 500 prizes have been awarded.
sentences.chinese: 在此的109年间，一共颁发了500多个诺贝尔奖。
诺贝尔奖冇嚸诎亽噫外。

sentences.english: He was awarded the Nobel Prize for achievements in physiology.
sentences.chinese: 他因生理学方面的成就而被授予诺贝尔奖。

sentences.english: Are there any Nobel Prize winners at Princeton?
sentences.chinese: 普林斯顿大学有没有培养出诺贝尔奖获得者呢？

sentences.english: He was awarded the Nobel Prize for achievements in physiology.
sentences.chinese: 他因生理学方面的建树而被授予诺贝尔奖。

sentences.english: I am both surprised and deeply humbled by the decision of the Noble Committee.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔奖委员会的决定令我既惊讶又深受感动。

sentences.english: This is Mo Yan who has gotten the Nobel prise and he was the author we are pride of.
sentences.chinese: 这是莫言已经诺贝尔奖赏和作者他是我们的骄傲。

sentences.english: The Curies won a Nobel Prize for their discovery.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫妇赢得了诺贝尔奖。

sentences.english: But, who cares, he got the Nobel prize.
sentences.chinese: 但是，谁在乎，他获得了诺贝尔奖。

sentences.english: Everyone of these, except Lintner I think, won the Nobel Prize.
sentences.chinese: 这些人中除了林特纳，都获得了诺贝尔奖。

sentences.english: According to Paragraph 4, which of the following is true of the Nobels?
sentences.chinese: 根据第四段，下面哪个关于诺贝尔奖的内容是正确的？
1901年的今天，第一届诺贝尔奖颁发。

definition: Nobel Prize/abbr. for 諾貝爾獎|诺贝尔奖[Nuo4 bei4 er3 Jiang3]

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wu4 li3 xue2 Jiang3
Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wen2 xue2 Jiang3

definition: Fields Medal (for mathematics, approximate equivalent to Nobel Prize)

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 He2 ping2 jiang3

definition: the Wolf prize (for science and arts)
Tsung-Dao Lee (1926-), Chinese American physicist, Columbia University, 1957 Nobel laureate
